abstract: Alexandros Tzorvas (Greek: Αλέξανδρος Τζόρβας; born 12 August 1982) is a Greek footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Apollon Smyrni and the Greek national team.
comment: Alexandros Tzorvas (Greek: Αλέξανδρος Τζόρβας; born 12 August 1982) is a Greek footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Apollon Smyrni and the Greek national team.
name: Alexandros Tzorvas
